text.value: Did you bathe, swim or play in nearby rivers, streams or ponds in the last week?
Was a urine sample successfully collected from this person?
You have just entered a value which will end the survey

Good morning ! I am here on behalf of the Ministry of Health. We are conducting a survey to determine the presence of schistosomiasis (SCH) and soil-transmitted helminthiasis (STH) in your school. I will ask you some questions about the mode and mechanism of transmission and would also appreciate collecting stool and urine samples from you. If you would like to participate in the survey, let me know and I will record your responses and provide you with stool and urine containers. If you agree, the survey will only take a few minutes. Participating in the school survey will directly benefit you because if worms are diagnosed, you will immediately receive deworming medication. Your community and school will also benefit directly, as the results of this survey will help the Ministry of Health implement deworming activities for children aged 10 to 14 years, if laboratory results reveal the need for interventions. You can refuse without penalty. Would you like to participate in our survey?
We do not want to go back if they do not give a sample because we cannot guarantee that there will be no exchange of samples.
Must be two digit between 99 and 1000
Have you ever been treated with PZQ? (show tablet, or photo of tablet)
Did parent or guardian or head teacher consent?
If no, when did you move here?
The answer "No" will end the survey
The two digit code assigned to you
The index must be used only once in the school and should be between 1 and 32
Was a stool sample successfully collected from this person?
How long ago did pupils in your school last receive deworming treatment (PZQ or ALB/MBD or both)?
The answer "No" will end the survey
Copy this code into all registers and sample pots
Age must be between 10 and 14 years old
Must be two digit between 9 and 100
Please inter the child sequence number
Have you always lived here, in this community?
Did you go fishing in nearby rivers, streams or ponds in the last week?
